message: ...When I open my eyes again, I'm standing in an empty white space.
I can't tell the floor from the ceiling. It's just an unbroken field of blinding white.
Ren is standing next to me in human form.
Does that mean we're in Rhyme?
Someone is standing in front of me.
Who?
Is that...
...Sei?
He has black hair and eyes in real life, but here, he's as white as the space around us, as if all the color has been leeched from his body.

name: セイ
message: "Aoba... Finally."
Sei smiles tenderly.
It's the first time I've heard his voice, but something about it feels so familiar.

No. Wait. I've heard it before.
Where...

name: セイ
message: "Come to me... quickly..."

name: セイ
message: "Dest...roy me..."

name: セイ
message: "With your pow...er..."
That was Sei...
His eyes are so deep... My heart is racing, and I don't mean in a weird way.
Sei narrows his eyes happily.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why do you look like that?"

name: セイ
message: "This is how we looked when we were born. When I'm here, this is how I appear. Perhaps I want things to be as they were then..."
A hint of sadness enters Sei's smile.

name: セイ
message: "I'm so glad you came. But at the same time, part of me hoped this day would never come."

name: セイ
message: "I know it was selfish of me, but..."
Sei lowers his eyes. What does he mean?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You didn't want me to come?"

name: セイ
message: "That's not what I meant. It's just that, you being here, it means I..."

name: セイ
message: "I'll be gone soon. You'll destroy me, Aoba. Won't you?"
I'm here to destroy Sei. To set him free.

At the same time, that also means...

I tremble.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Can't we leave together?"

name: セイ
message: "...You don't know how happy that makes me. I wish we could. But my heart... my soul is too weak."

name: セイ
message: "I'm sorry for asking you to do this, but it means everything to me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You've spent your whole life with Toue, haven't you?"

name: セイ
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That weird game I kept getting. That was you, wasn't it? You were helping me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And the invitation to Platinum Jail. That was you too."
Toue said that the pieces of Sei's consciousness had spread throughout the network.
Those games... Those messages from the "Damsel in Distress."
They didn't make any sense to me at the time... but now I get it.
They were all from Sei.
He's been helping me all this time.

name: セイ
message: "You could say I was trying to help you... but to be honest, it was selfish. I just wanted to to bring you here sooner."

name: セイ
message: "So that you could destroy me."
That's Sei's only wish now. Far too much time has passed for there to be any other end.
His life was unending despair. The one ray of light in his prison... was the hope that I would one day destroy him.
It's just so...
So...
I clutch my chest.
Sei and I are brothers, but only Sei had to suffer like this.
I know there's nothing I can do about it now...
...but it still hurts.
